Title: Everybody must take precautions against epidemics to smash the germ warfare of American imperialism!
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: During the Korean War, the Chinese leaders are convinced that the US are preparing to use bacterial weapons against the country. Massive inoculation campaigns are started to protect the people.The caricature below is Dean Acheson, Secretary of State of the USA at the time.
